/* Winners and finalists */ rm third and fourth from table to tone down proportion of article which is tables
no ambiguity, gridiron, gaelic and aussie rules have no world cup, rugby tournament is known as "Rugby World Cup"
/* Other FIFA tournaments */ slight expand of women
rm Womens' WC from lead. Material in body is "see also" in tone, so no need to summarise in lead
rv, read the footnote right next to the edit just made
